name: In Plain Sight (itch)
description:
“Codes are too dangerous. Your correspondence is being monitored and a code would be immediately intercepted, but maybe you could slip a message by if it doesn’t arouse suspicion.”

In Plain Sight is an epistolary rpg, where you take the roles of characters who need to send messages to each other, but whose communication is being observed, so you have to hide meaning without it looking suspicious. Write letters back and forth with a friend, each one containing a secret message for them to find!

Made during the covid-19 pandemic, in the hopes that it provides a fun way to stay connected when we have to be apart. Support your post office!
